channel.title: Zelle International Stablecoin Payments
channel.description: Will Zelle launch international stablecoin payments by Q3 2026?

item.title: Will Zelle launch international stablecoin payments by Q3 2026?
item.description: Zelle, processing $1 trillion in 2024, explores stablecoin adoption for international payments. With GENIUS Act providing regulatory clarity, market resolves YES if Zelle launches stablecoin-based cross-border payments by Sept 30, 2026.

resolution.rules: Market resolves YES if Zelle officially launches a live, publicly accessible international payment service that accepts stablecoin payments (USDC, USDT, or similar) for cross-border transactions by September 30, 2026. Resolution requires official Zelle press release or verified user reports of the feature being active.
